mapper.insert: insert into setmeal (category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
update setmeal
name = #{name},
category_id = #{categoryId},
price = #{price},
status = #{status},
description = #{description},
image = #{image},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select s.*, sd.id sd_id, sd.setmeal_id, sd.dish_id, sd.name sd_name, sd.price sd_price, sd.copies from setmeal s left join setmeal_dish sd on s.id = sd.setmeal_id where s.id = #{id}
